configuration.name: Scenario: Verify customer rating filters are working properly

option.name: NAME_FILTER

option.name: PROGRAM_PARAMETERS
option.value: --plugin org.jetbrains.plugins.cucumber.java.run.CucumberJvm5SMFormatter --name "^Verify customer rating filters are working properly$"

option.name: SUGGESTED_NAME
